Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, better for business than holiday”
Reviews.Author: LatvianTraveller
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights nov 8 till nov 11 chose mainly location close hilton hotel business venue hilton basically corner rer station conveniently located near 57 minutes walk easy red blue train line airport cdg champs elysees close floor door breakfast ok double bed obviously double husband short space little nice cosy clean tv nice closet clothes sized bathroom tastefully decorated breakfast disappointment little choice available besides pastry dont eat musli doesnt count coffee breaks seminar coffee tasty lady servicing breakfast nice friendly welcoming paid 150 euro night hotel information tariff actually 300 paid 300 night stay husband wouldnt happy liked hotel business purposes
